And I tried to unsubscribe and that didnâ€™t work either, I just kept getting more spam, even from random porn sites just hacking into my phone and my computer and even my email got hacked. I think my identity may have gotten stolen too because a day after I got this app, my bank froze my bank account because of suspicious activity on my account. Apparently there were charges made on my credit card from Mexico and I live in South Carolina. And never even been to Mexico. Apparently the wall we built doesnâ€™t stop identity theft.
